template.name: ts
template.value: Transform: AWS::Serverless-2016-10-31

template.name: fn
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Serverless::Function Properties: CodeUri: ./$FILE$ Handler: $HANDLER$ Runtime: $RUNTIME$

template.name: fnp
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Serverless::Function Properties: CodeUri: ./$END$.py Handler: index.handler Runtime: python3.6

template.name: fn3
template.value: $RESOURCE$: Type: AWS::Serverless::Function Properties: CodeUri: ./$FILE$ Handler: $HANDLER$ Runtime: $RUNTIME$ FunctionName: $FN_NAME$ Role: !Sub '${$ROLE$.Arn}' MemorySize: $MEMORY$ Timeout: $TIMEOUT$ VpcConfig: SecurityGroupIds: !Ref $GROUPS$ SubnetIds: !Ref $SUBNETS$ Description: $DESCRIPTION$ ReservedConcurrentExecutions: $CONCURRENT$

template.name: sub
template.value: !Sub '${$RESOURCE$}'

template.name: fn1
template.value: $RESOURCE$: Type: AWS::Serverless::Function Properties: CodeUri: ./$FILE$ Handler: $HANDLER$ Runtime: $RUNTIME$ MemorySize: $MEMORY$ Timeout: $TIMEOUT$

template.name: fn2
template.value: $RESOURCE$: Type: AWS::Serverless::Function Properties: CodeUri: ./$FILE$ Handler: $HANDLER$ Runtime: $RUNTIME$ FunctionName: $FN_NAME$ MemorySize: $MEMORY$ Timeout: $TIMEOUT$ ReservedConcurrentExecutions: $CONCURRENT$

template.name: fnr
template.value: $ROLE$: Type: AWS::IAM::Role Properties: AssumeRolePolicyDocument: Statement: - Action: sts:AssumeRole Effect: Allow Principal: Service: lambda.amazonaws.com ManagedPolicyArns: ['arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole'] Policies: - PolicyName: $POLICY_NAME$ PolicyDocument: Version: 2012-10-17 Statement: - Effect: Allow Action: ['$ACTIONS$'] Resource: !Sub '$END$${$RESOURCE$}'

template.name: P
template.value: Parameters: $END$

template.name: p3
template.value: $NAME$: Type: $TYPE$ AllowedPattern: AllowedValues: $VALUES$ Default: $DEFAULT$ ConstraintDescription: Description: $DESCRIPTION$ NoEcho: true MinValue: 1 MaxValue: MinLength: 1 MaxLength: $END$

template.name: ps
template.value: $NAME$: Type: String $END$

template.name: p2
template.value: $NAME$: Type: $TYPE$ AllowedValues: $VALUES$ Default: $DEFAULT$ Description: $DESCRIPTION$ NoEcho: true $END$

template.name: p1
template.value: $NAME$: Type: $TYPE$ Default: $DEFAULT$ Description: $DESCRIPTION$ $END$

template.name: v
template.value: AWSTemplateFormatVersion: '2010-09-09' $END$

template.name: O
template.value: Outputs: $END$

template.name: o2
template.value: $NAME$: Value: !Ref $VALUE$ Export: Name: $NAME$ Description: $DESC$ $END$

template.name: o1
template.value: $NAME$: Value: !Ref $VALUE$ $END$

template.name: M
template.value: Mappings: $END$

template.name: m
template.value: $NAME$: $ONE$: $KEY$: '$VALUE$'$END$

template.name: R
template.value: Resources: $END$

template.name: d
template.value: Description: '$DESC$' $END$

template.name: cwes
template.value: $NAME$: Type: Schedule Properties: Schedule: rate($COUNT$ $PERIOD$) Input: !Sub '{"$KEY$": "${$VALUE$}"}'

template.name: fni
template.value: InvokePermission: Type: AWS::Lambda::Permission Properties: FunctionName: !Ref $FN$ Action: 'lambda:InvokeFunction' Principal: $PRINCIPAL$.amazonaws.com SourceAccount: $ACCOUNT$ SourceArn: !Sub 'arn:aws:$SERVICE$:::$RESOURCE$' $END$
template.description: an invoke permission on a function

template.name: acm
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::CertificateManager::Certificate Properties: DomainName: !Ref $DOMAIN$ $END$

template.name: acmf
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::CertificateManager::Certificate Properties: DomainName: $DOMAIN$ SubjectAlternativeNames: $SAN$ DomainValidationOptions: $DVO$ Tags: [$TAGS$] $END$

template.name: ago
template.value: $API$InvokeUrl: Description: Endpoint of the $API$ API Value: !Sub 'https://${$START$}.execute-api.${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com/$STAGE$' $END$

template.name: cbf
template.value: $NAME$Project: Type: AWS::CodeBuild::Project Properties: Artifacts: Type: $ARTEFACT$ Description: $DESC$ Environment: ComputeType: BUILD_GENERAL1_MEDIUM Image: 'aws/codebuild/$IMAGE$' Type: LINUX_CONTAINER #EnvironmentVariables: #- Name: KEY #Value: VALUE Name: '$ENV_NAME$' ServiceRole: !Sub '${$ROLE_NAME$ServiceRole.Arn}' Source: Type: $SOURCE$ TimeoutInMinutes: $TIMEOUT$

template.name: cc
template.value: $NAME$Repo: Type: AWS::CodeCommit::Repository Properties: RepositoryName: '$R_NAME$' RepositoryDescription: '$DESC$'

variable.name: DESC
variable.expression: concat("Git repo for the ", NAME, " project)

template.name: cfrw
template.value: $NAME$CDN: Type: AWS::CloudFront::Distribution Properties: DistributionConfig: Enabled: true Aliases: [!Ref $CERTIFICATE$] ViewerCertificate: AcmCertificateArn: !Ref SSLCertificate SslSupportMethod: 'sni-only' Origins: - Id: '$ORIGIN_ID$' DomainName: !Sub '${$BUCKET$}.s3-website-${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com' CustomOriginConfig: OriginProtocolPolicy: 'http-only' DefaultCacheBehavior: ViewerProtocolPolicy: 'redirect-to-https' ForwardedValues: QueryString: false Cookies: Forward: none TargetOriginId: '$ORIGIN_ID$' MinTTL: $MIN_TTL$ DefaultTTL: $DEFAULT_TTL$ Compress: true $END$
template.description: cloudfront distribution for an s3-backed website

template.name: cwaf
template.value:
$FN$: Type: AWS::Lambda::Function Properties: Handler: index.handler Runtime: python3.6 Role: !Sub '${$ROLE$.Arn}' Code: ZipFile: | import json
def handler(event, context): for record in event['Records']: message = json.loads(record['Sns']['Message'])
alarm_name = message['AlarmName'] alarm_description = message['AlarmDescription'] account_id = message['AWSAccountId'] new_state = message['NewStateValue'] new_state_reason = message['NewStateReason'] state_timestamp = message['StateChangeTime'] region = message['Region'] old_state = message['OldStateValue'] print( 'alarm_name: "{}" alarm_description: "{}" account_id: "{}" old_state: "{}" new_state: "{}" new_state_reason: "{}" state_timestamp: "{}" region: "{}"'.format( alarm_name, alarm_description, account_id, old_state, new_state, new_state_reason, state_timestamp, region))
$ROLE$: Type: AWS::IAM::Role Properties: AssumeRolePolicyDocument: Statement: - Action: 'sts:AssumeRole' Effect: Allow Principal: Service: [lambda.amazonaws.com] ManagedPolicyArns: ['arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole']
Permission: Type: AWS::Lambda::Permission Properties: FunctionName: !Ref $FN$ Action: 'lambda:InvokeFunction' Principal: sns.amazonaws.com
$NOTIF$: Type: AWS::SNS::Topic Properties: Subscription: - Endpoint: !Sub '${$FN$.Arn}' Protocol: lambda
Alarm: Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm Properties: OKActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] InsufficientDataActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] AlarmActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] # rest of properties, e.g: ComparisonOperator, Threshold, EvaluationPeriods, Period, MetricName, Namespace

template.name: cwee
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Events::Rule Properties: Description: $DESC$ Name: $NAME$ ScheduleExpression: !Join ['', [!Sub 'rate($NUMBER$ $SCHEDULE_RATE$', !If [Plural, 's', ''], ')']] State: 'ENABLED' Targets: - Id: '$TARGET$-task-definition' RoleArn: !Sub '${$ROLE$.Arn}' EcsParameters: TaskDefinitionArn: !Ref $TASK_DEF$ Arn: !Sub 'arn:aws:ecs:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:cluster/$CLUSTER$' $END$

template.name: cwet
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Events::Rule Properties: Name: '$ID$-event-rule' EventPattern: source: ['aws.$SOURCE$'] detail-type: ['AWS API Call via CloudTrail'] detail: eventSource: ['$SOURCE$.amazonaws.com'] eventName: ['$EVENTS$'] State: 'ENABLED' Targets: - Id: '$ID$-target' Arn: !Sub '${$FN$.Arn}' $END$

template.name: dy
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table DeletionPolicy: $DEL$ Properties: ProvisionedThroughput: ReadCapacityUnits: $READ$ WriteCapacityUnits: $WRITE$ KeySchema: - AttributeName: $KEY$ KeyType: $KEY_TYPE$ AttributeDefinitions: - AttributeName: $ATTR$ AttributeType: $ATTR_TYPE$ $END$

template.name: iamu
template.value: $NAME$User: Type: AWS::IAM::User Properties: UserName: $USERNAME$ ManagedPolicyArns: ['$ARN$'] $END$

template.name: l
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Logs::LogGroup Properties: RetentionInDays: $DAYS$ LogGroupName: $LNAME$ $END$

template.name: l1
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Logs::LogGroup $END$

template.name: lm
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Logs::MetricFilter Properties: LogGroupName: $LOG$ FilterPattern: '$PATTERN$' MetricTransformations: - MetricName: $M_NAME$ MetricNamespace: $M_NAMESPACE$ MetricValue: $M_VALUE$ $END$

template.name: lmf
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::Logs::MetricFilter Properties: LogGroupName: !Sub '/aws/lambda/${$FN$}' FilterPattern: '[$PATTERN$]' MetricTransformations: - MetricName: $M_NAME$ MetricNamespace: $M_NAMESPACE$ MetricValue: $M_VALUE$ $END$

template.name: r
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::IAM::Role Properties: AssumeRolePolicyDocument: Statement: - Action: sts:AssumeRole Effect: Allow Principal: Service: $SERVICE$.amazonaws.com ManagedPolicyArns: ['$MANAGED_POLICIES$'] Policies: - PolicyName: $POLICY_NAME$ PolicyDocument: Version: 2012-10-17 Statement: - Effect: Allow Action: ['$ACTION$'] Resource: '$RESOURCE$'

template.name: s3
template.value: OurBucket: Type: AWS::S3::Bucket Properties: BucketName: $NAME$

template.name: s3bp
template.value: $NAME$BucketPolicy: Type: AWS::S3::BucketPolicy Properties: Bucket: !Ref $B_NAME$ PolicyDocument: Version: '2008-10-17' Statement: - Sid: $SID$ Effect: Allow Principal: AWS: $PRINCIPAL$$END$ Action: ['$ACTION$'] Resource: [!Sub 'arn:aws:s3:::${$RESOURCE$}/*']

template.name: s3ef
template.value: - Event: 's3:$EVENT$' Function: !Sub '${$FN$.Arn}' Filter: S3Key: Rules: - Name: $NAME$ Value: $EXT$

template.name: s3l
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::S3::Bucket Properties: LifecycleConfiguration: Rules: - Prefix: $PREFIX$ ExpirationInDays: $EXP$ Status: Enabled $END$

template.name: sne
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::SNS::Topic Properties: Subscription: - Endpoint: !Ref $EMAIL$ Protocol: email

template.name: cwa
template.value:
$NOTIF$: Type: AWS::SNS::Topic Properties: Subscription: - Endpoint: !Ref $ENDPOINT$ Protocol: $PROTOCOL$
Alarm: Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm Properties: OKActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] InsufficientDataActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] AlarmActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] # rest of properties, e.g: ComparisonOperator, Threshold, EvaluationPeriods, Period, MetricName, Namespace

template.name: asglc
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration Properties: ImageId: $IMG$ SecurityGroups: [!Ref $SG$] InstanceType: $TYPE$ BlockDeviceMappings: - DeviceName: '/dev/$EBS$' Ebs: VolumeSize: $SIZE$ - DeviceName: '/dev/$DEV$' VirtualName: $VNAME$ $END$

template.name: cwb
template.value: BillingAlarm: Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm Properties: AlarmDescription: !Sub 'Alarm if AWS spending is over ${$THRESHOLD$} $CUR_DESC$' Namespace: AWS/Billing MetricName: EstimatedCharges Dimensions: - Name: Currency Value: $CUR$ Statistic: Maximum Period: $PERIOD$ EvaluationPeriods: 1 Threshold: [!Ref $THRESHOLD$] ComparisonOperator: GreaterThanThreshold AlarmActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$] InsufficientDataActions: [!Ref $NOTIF$]

template.name: cwca
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm Properties: AlarmDescription: !Sub 'CPU alarm for the ${$INSTANCE$} instance' AlarmActions: [!Ref $TOPIC$] MetricName: CPUUtilization Namespace: AWS/EC2 Statistic: Average Period: '60' EvaluationPeriods: '3' Threshold: $THRESHOLD$ ComparisonOperator: GreaterThanThreshold Dimensions: - Name: InstanceId Value: !Ref $INSTANCE$

template.name: cwd
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Dashboard Properties: DashboardName: $D_NAME$ DashboardBody: !Sub '{"widgets":[{"type":"metric","x":0,"y":0,"width":12,"height":6,"properties":{"metrics":[["AWS/EC2","CPUUtilization","InstanceId","i-012345"]],"period":300,"stat":"Average","region":"$REGION$","title":"EC2 Instance CPU"}},{"type":"text","x":0,"y":7,"width":3,"height":3,"properties":{"markdown":"$TEXT$"}}]}'

template.name: eba
template.value: $APP$: Type: AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::Application Properties: Description: $DESC$ $VERSION$: Type: AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::ApplicationVersion Properties: ApplicationName: !Ref $APP$ SourceBundle: S3Bucket: $BUCKET$ S3Key: $KEY$ $TEMPLATE$: Type: AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::ConfigurationTemplate Properties: ApplicationName: !Ref $APP$ SolutionStackName: $STACK$ OptionSettings: - Namespace: aws:autoscaling:asg OptionName: MinSize Value: '$MIN$' - Namespace: aws:autoscaling:asg OptionName: MaxSize Value: '$MAX$' - Namespace: aws:elasticbeanstalk:environment OptionName: EnvironmentType Value: $ENV_TYPE$ $ENV$: Type: AWS::ElasticBeanstalk::Environment Properties: ApplicationName: !Ref $APP$ TemplateName: !Ref $TEMPLATE$ VersionLabel: !Ref $VERSION$ $END$

variable.name: STACK
variable.expression: enum("64bit Amazon Linux 2017.09 v2.9.1 running Docker 17.12.0-ce","64bit Amazon Linux 2017.09 v2.9.1 running Multi-container Docker 17.12.0-ce (Generic)","64bit Amazon Linux 2017.09 v2.6.5 running Python 3.6","64bit Amazon Linux 2017.09 v2.7.6 running Tomcat 8 Java 8","64bit Amazon Linux 2017.09 v4.4.5 running Node.js","64bit Amazon Linux 2017.09 v2.6.5 running PHP 7.1")

template.name: ec2i
template.value:
$NAME$: Type: AWS::IAM::Role Properties: AssumeRolePolicyDocument: Version: '2012-10-17' Statement: - Effect: Allow Action: sts:AssumeRole Principal: Service: ec2.amazonaws.com
$NAME$Policy: Type: AWS::IAM::Policy Properties: PolicyName: $NAME2$ Roles: [!Ref RootRole] PolicyDocument: Version: '2012-10-17' Statement: - Effect: Allow Action: ['$ACTION$'] Resource: ['$RESOURCE$']
$NAME$InstanceProfile: Type: AWS::IAM::InstanceProfile Properties: Roles: [!Ref $NAME$] $INSTRUCTION$ $END$

variable.name: INSTRUCTION
variable.expression: concat("# now specify !Ref ", NAME, "InstanceProfile as IamInstanceProfile property in AWS::EC2::Instance or an AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration")

template.name: ecr
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::ECR::Repository Properties: RepositoryName: $R_NAME$ $END$

template.name: ecssb
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::ECS::Service Properties: Cluster: !Ref $CLUSTER$ DesiredCount: $COUNT$ LoadBalancers: - ContainerName: !Ref $CONTAINER$ ContainerPort: $PORT$ TargetGroupArn: !Ref $TG$ TaskDefinition: !Ref $TD$ Role: !Sub arn:aws:iam::${AWS::AccountId}:role/aws-service-role/ecs.amazonaws.com/AWSServiceRoleForECS $END$
template.description: ecs service to be attached to an ELB

template.name: efs
template.value:
$NAME$: Type: AWS::EFS::FileSystem Properties: FileSystemTags: - Key: Name Value: $TAG_NAME$ PerformanceMode: $PERF$
MountTarget: Type: AWS::EFS::MountTarget DependsOn: [$NAME$, EfsSecurityGroup] Properties: FileSystemId: !Ref $NAME$ SubnetId: !Ref $SUBNET$ SecurityGroups: [!Ref EfsSecurityGroup]
EfsSecurityGroup: Type: AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup Properties: VpcId: !Ref $VPC$ GroupDescription: $GROUP$ $END$
template.description: a filesystem, a mount target and its security group

template.name: eip
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::EC2::EIP Properties: InstanceId: !Ref $INSTANCE$
template.description: attaches elastic ip to an instance

template.name: eipa
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::EC2::EIPAssociation Properties: InstanceId: !Ref $INSTANCE$ EIP: !Ref $EIP$
template.description: associates existing elastic ip to an instance

template.name: iamag
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::IAM::UserToGroupAddition Properties: GroupName: $GROUP$ Users: !Ref $USER_LIST$ $END$

template.name: iampg
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::IAM::Policy Properties: PolicyName: $NAME2$ PolicyDocument: Version: '2012-10-17' Statement: - Effect: Allow Action: ['$ACTIONS$'] Resource: '$RES$' Groups: [!Ref $GROUP$] $END$

template.name: paz
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::EC2::AvailabilityZone::Name

template.name: pazl
template.value: $NAME$: Type: List<AWS::EC2::AvailabilityZone::Name>

template.name: sg2
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup Properties: GroupDescription: allow SecurityGroupIngress: - IpProtocol: $PROTOCOL1$ FromPort: $PORT1$ ToPort: $TO_PORT1$ CidrIp: $CIDR1$ - IpProtocol: $PROTOCOL2$ FromPort: $PORT2$ ToPort: $TO_PORT2$ CidrIp: $CIDR2$

template.name: snsp
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::SNS::TopicPolicy Properties: PolicyDocument: Id: $NAME2$ Version: '2012-10-17' Statement: - Sid: $NAME2$ Effect: Allow Principal: AWS: !Sub '${$USER$.Arn}' Action: sns:Publish Resource: '*' Topics: [!Ref $TOPIC$] $END$

template.name: sqsp
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::SQS::QueuePolicy Properties: PolicyDocument: Id: $NAME2$ Version: '2012-10-17' Statement: - Sid: $NAME2$ Effect: Allow Principal: AWS: !Sub '${$USER$.Arn}' Action: sqs:SendMessage Resource: '*' Queues: [!Ref $QUEUE$] $END$

template.name: st
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::CloudFormation::Stack Properties: TemplateURL: '$URL$' TimeoutInMinutes: $TIME$ Parameters: $END$

template.name: td
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::ECS::TaskDefinition Properties: Family: $FAMILY$ Volumes: - Name: $VOL$ Host: SourcePath: $VOL_PATH$ ContainerDefinitions: - Name: $CONTAINER$ Image: $IMAGE$ MemoryReservation: !FindInMap [Performance, MemoryReservation, !Ref Size] LogConfiguration: LogDriver: awslogs Options: awslogs-region: !Ref AWS::Region awslogs-group: !Ref $LOG_GROUP$ MountPoints: - ContainerPath: $C_PATH$ SourceVolume: $VOL$ #ReadOnly: true PortMappings: - ContainerPort: $PORT$

template.name: vol
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::EC2::Volume Properties: AvailabilityZone: !Ref $AZ$ Size: $SIZE$ Encrypted: $ENCRYPTED$ VolumeType: $TYPE$ Iops: $IOPS$ $END$

template.name: vpce
template.value: $NAME$: Type: AWS::EC2::VPCEndpoint Properties: ServiceName: !Sub 'com.amazonaws.${AWS::Region}.$SERVICE$' VpcId: !Ref $VPC$ RouteTableIds: [!Ref $RT$] $END$
